channel.title: Public Records on Gavin Rozzi
channel.description: Recent content in Public Records on Gavin Rozzi

item.title: Document Production in Rozzi v. OAG
item.description: I recently obtained the following documents from the New Jersey Attorney General’s Office (OAG) which were produced in response to a court order isued in my lawsuit against the OAG. The documents were copies of email logs that show messages sent and received by the OAG’s custodian of records, who is responsible for complying with the provision of the New Jersey Open Public Records Act (OPRA) by way of responding to requests made under the state freedom of information law.
